pages.text: $(item)Metal Blox$() are the toughest of all$(blox)Blox$() and can be found in the world. They have a singular use in the form of crafting $(l:kingdomkeys:misc/pedestal)Pedestals$(). You can craft Metal Blox using $(l:kingdomkeys:blox/hard)Hard Blox$() and $(thing)Iron ingots$(), the recipe is as follows.
